Package com.intellij.util.ui

Class RegionPainter.Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.util.ui.RegionPainter.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    ErrorStripePainter
    Enclosing interface:
    RegionPainter<T>

    public static class RegionPainter.Image
extends java.lang.Object
implements RegionPainter<java.lang.Object>
    This class provides a caching functionality for a region painter.

      • Image

        public Image()

    • Method Detail

      • updateImage

        protected void updateImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image)
        This method is called for the cached image before drawImage. It should be overridden if the image must be updated without creating a new image.
        Parameters:
        image - the cached image to update

      • createImage

        protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage createImage(int width,
                                                   int height)
        This method is called if the cached image is invalidated or it's size is changed. It must be overridden to paint on newly created image.
        Parameters:
        width - width of the new image
        height - height of the new image
        Returns:
        new BufferedImage object

      • invalidate

        protected void invalidate()
        This method is called to invalidate the cached image.

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  int width,
                  int height,
                  java.lang.Object object)
        Description copied from interface: RegionPainter
        Renders to the given Graphics2D object.
        Specified by:
        paint in interface RegionPainter<java.lang.Object>
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics2D object to render to
        x - X position of the area to paint
        y - Y position of the area to paint
        width - width of the area to paint
        height - height of the area to paint
        object - an optional configuration parameter
